inn1.comm: loud appeal for lbw first up, Tanvir seams the ball into the left-hander from over the wicket, Jayasuriya moves forward and gets hit on the pad, that was close very close
Tanvir pitches the ball on a good length outside off and nips the ball back into the left-hander, Jayasuriya lets it go
more swing into the left-hander for Tanvir, Jayasuriya strides forward and plays the ball back to the bowler
that's a poor ball, short and wide and Jayasuriya frees those powerful forearms of his and cuts the ball hard, he's hit it straight to point though
better line and length, closer to off stump, Jayasuriya moves forward and defends
Tanvir starts with a maiden, Jayasuriya blocks the last ball, which is again on a good length on off and middle, towards the leg side
thats' a real loosener, short and wide outside off stump, Sangakkara waits on the back foot and cuts the ball in the air over backward point for four
closer to off stump this time, Sangakkara moves back and opens the face to collect a single towards third man
that's a gift, short of a length and wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya waits on the front foot and lofts the ball over cover for four more
better line and length this time, Jayasuriya defends on the off side off the front foot
fuller length on off stump, Jayasuriya drives off the front foot towards mid-off, Jayasuriya checked his stroke at the last moment
good length on middle stump, Jayasuriya moves forward and drives on the up between mid on and mid off for two more, eleven of Riaz's first over
Tanvir pitches the ball full and wide outside off stump, Sangakkara lets it go but Tony Hill signals wide
good length delivery outside the off stump, Sangakkara defends on the front foot
that's too full and too far down leg side, Sangakkara tries to flick but can't make contact, Tony hill signals another wide
Sangakkara moves on to the front foot and clips a fullish delivery off his pads to square leg
Sangakkara moves forward and across his stumps and nudges a short of a length ball off his pads towards long leg

short of a length and the line is wide outside off stump, Jayasuriya has a real crack at it and cuts the ball hard towards point where the debutant Amjad makes a fine save to his right, they run a single
good length delivery outside off, left alone by the batsman
tight line and length just outside off stump once again, Sangakkara lets it go
short of a length delivery on the pads, Jayasuriya flicks it off his hips towards the fielder at short fine leg, dangerous line to be bowling when fine leg is in the circle
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Jayasuriya gets on to the back foot and runs the ball to third man
good length from Iftikhar, pitches around off stump and slants across the left-hander, Sangakkara waits in his crease and defends on the off side
that's too straight once again, on leg stump, Sangakkara moves forward and flicks the ball off his pads towards deep square leg
good length delivery pitches outside off and angles away from Sangakkara who lets it go
once again the line is too straight, on leg stump, Sangakkara moves across his stumps to get inside the line and glances the ball to the fine-leg boundary

lbw! Tanvir pitches the ball on a good length outside off and seams it into the left-hander, Jayasuriya gets caught on the crease and the ball beats his tentative defence and thuds into the pad plumb in front of middle, this time Tony Hill agrees with Tanvir's appeal
Tanvir's still bowling to the left-hander but it's Jayawardene on strike and the ball is way down leg side
Tanvir pitches on the fuller side on leg stump, Jayawardene plays the ball off his pads towards square leg
this time he pitches wide outside off stump and slants the ball further away from the right-hander, that's another wide
straighter line on leg and middle, on a good length, Jayawardene defends on the front foot
he angles the ball into Jayawardene from round the wicket and Jayawardene meets it with the full face of the bat and defends on the off side
Tanvir pitches the ball on a good length and squares Jayawardene up with one that straightens off the pitch, the outside edge runs down to third man
tight line and length on off and middle, Sangakkara defends on the front foot towards Tanvir
short of a length on off stump, Jayawardene gets behind the line and defends
Iftikhar's strayed on to the pads once more and that's too easy for Jayawardene, he moves across and nudges the ball down to the fine-leg boundary
he's back outside the off stump this time, Jayawardene defends on the back foot towards cover point
Jayawardene waits in his crease for a short of a length delivery and punches towards cover
Jayawardene moves forward and tries to drive a good length ball on the up through the off side, the ball bounces a bit more and the thick edge runs towards third man
lovely line, just outside the off stump and the length is spot on as well, Sangakkara lets it go through to Sarfraz
that's wide No 5, full and down leg side, Tony Hill stretches his arms again
Jayawardene gets behind the line of a good length ball on off and middle and defends with a straight bat
wide ball outside off stump, Jayawardene strides forward and drives away from his body, hitting the ball on the up through extra cover for four, superbly timed
straighter line on middle stump, Jayawardene defends off the back foot on the leg side
played off the pads towards square leg
a full ball angles into the right-hander, Jayawardene nudges the ball down to long leg for a single
good length ball on off stump, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
short of a length delivery on off stump, Jayawardene gets behind the line on the back foot and blocks towards the bowler
defended off the back foot towards cover
Iftikhar's got his line right in this over so far, no room outside off stump to work with, Jayawardene defends off the back foot
spoke too soon, the line is wide this time and Jayawardene opens the face as he leans forward to drive and places the ball through point, Wahab stops it with his boot on the boundary
short of a length outside off stump, Jayawardene tries to cut it to third man but the fielder at a wide second slip stops it
excellent ball, pitches on a good length outside off stump and bounces a bit extra, Jayawardene comes forward to block but gets beaten
short of a length and wide outside off stump, Sangakkara cuts hard but can't beat the fielder at point
better line and length closer to off stump, Sangakkara gets behind the line and defends
this time Wahab pitches outside off and angles the ball into the left-hander, Sangakkara stays in his crease and plays the ball behind point for one
that's too straight, on leg stump, Jayawardene gets hit on the thigh and the ball runs fine towards the boundary where Iftikhar picks it up
Jayawardene tries to flick this time but gets squared up a touch and doesn't make contact
short of a length on middle stump, Jayawardene moves on to the back foot and defends on the leg side, far better comeback over from Wahab
good length delivery outside off stump, Sangakkara waits in his crease and plays a punchy defensive stroke on the off side

some shot that is, Sangakkara did not have much room outside off but somehow he managed to punch it firmly through cover, Afridi hurtled after the ball and slid to pull it in just inside the boudnary, committed effort
ah that's far too short and Jayawardene has enough time to move back and pull the ball smoothly through midwicket, such grace he has when he plays that shot
dropped with soft hands on the off side for a single
pitches on a good length around off and seams away from the left-hander, Sangakkara lets the ball go through to Sarfraz
Sangakkara moves forward and drives a fuller delivery towards mid-on
Jayawardene defends back towards the bowler off the front foot, Shoaib Malik has taken the second Powerplay incidentally
tight line, giving the batsman no room outside off stump, Jayawardene plays the ball from his crease towards point
Jayawardene moves forward and punches towards cover
Jayawardene tries to cut a short of a length delivery that's wide outside off but gets a thick bottom edge into the ground
full ball on the pads, Jayawardene flicks the ball firmly but Misbah dives to his right and makes the save at midwicket
the line is too straight once again from Wahab, Jayawardene moves forward and across and flicks the ball from his pads towards long leg, just one run of the over, Sri Lanka reach 50
good length from Iftikhar, pitches outside off and angles into the right-hander, Jayawardene drives towards mid-off
short, wide and the ball disappears to the point boundary after Jayawardene moves forward and cuts the ball hard
fuller length but the line is still wide, Jayawardene strides forward and drives the ball towards cover where Afridi runs to his right and picks it up in the in-field
that's a little slower from Iftikhar outside off stump, Jayawardene moves forward and punches towards cover
once again the length is short and the line is wide, Jayawardene helps himself to another four by playing a powerful cut, the ball races across the outfield and Yousuf at third man has no chance
better line and length, closer to off stump, Jayawardene stays in his crease and opens the face to play the ball towards point
short of a length outside off stump, Sangakkara defends on the off side on the back foot
the line is a little wider which allows Sangakkara to cut the ball towards point, he didn't time that well
Sangakkara plays a short of a length delivery towards backward point and responds to Jayawardene's call for a quick single
straight line on middle stump, Jayawardene pushes the ball towards cover and once again calls for the sharp single
good length delivery on off stump, Sangakkara moves forward and towards the line of the ball and punches to Afridi at cover, he throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end but Jayawardene is safe
once again Sangakkara punches towards Afridi who only pretends to throw at the non-striker's end this time, only two runs off this over, Wahab is making a strong comeback
Jayawardene stays in his crease and uses the angle across him to run the ball towards third man
Sangakkara moves across his stumps and flicks a delivery that angles into him through midwicket

caught! Jayawardene tries to cut the ball once again but this time the line is too close to the body for the shot, he doesn't time it well and the ball flies towards point where Misbah takes a sharp catch to his right
good length and line on middle stump, Kapugedera stays on his crease and defends on the leg side
played off the pads behind square for a single, Kapugedera's away
good length delivery angling into the left-hander, defended on the front foot towards extra cover
good length outside the off stump, Kapugedera stays on his crease and defends to point
Kapugedera tries to pull but it doesn't bounce as much and the ball passes below the bat
that's a gift, full and wide outside off stump, Kapugedera reaches out for it and drives the ball firmly along the ground through cover for four
good length and the line is close to off stump forcing Kapugedera to go back and defend on the off side
Kapugedera takes a step back and tries to force the ball on the off side, he ends up playing it towards Wahab
short of a length outside off stump, Kapugedera goes on the back foot once again and plays the ball to point
pushed off the back foot towards point for a single
Tanvir's over-stepped, so Kapugedera has a free hit the next ball, this one was on a good length and Kapugedera defended it on the off side
... and delivers a clever slower ball on a good length, Kapugedera tries to pull and misses completely, he gets hit on the thigh for a leg bye
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
good length delivery angling into off stump, Sangakkara gets on to the front foot and defends with a straight bat
the slower ball has gone horribly wrong for Tanvir, it's extremely wide outside off stump and he has really struggled to control his line today

too full and Sangakkara takes a small step forward and punches it with a lovely straight bat, the ball hasn't been hit with any power but the timing is so good that the ball steadily gathers pace as it runs to the straight boundary
whipped off his pads through midwicket and Sangakkara will keep strike
short of a length delivery angling into the left-hander, Sangakkara waits for it on the back foot and drops the ball with soft hands towards point, he sprints for the single
Kapugedera moves back in his crease and nudges a short of a length ball off his hips towards long leg
too straight this time and Sangakkara clips it sweetly off his pads towards square leg where Butt dives full length to his right to pull off the save
Kapugedera's feet remain cemented to the crease as he tries to run the ball to third man, he gets a bottom edge that bounces on its way through to Sarfraz who takes it well
Kapugedera punches the ball towards the bowler and sets off for the single, Sangakkara waits until the ball passes Wahab and only then sets off, he makes it easily enough in the end
classy shot, he moves across his crease and works a short of a length ball off his hips into the gap between deep backward square and fine leg for four
a bit too full outside off from over the wicket, Kapugedera leans forward and drives through cover point, Misbah gives chase
a bit shorter this time outside off stump, Kapugedera cuts from close to his stumps and hits it to short third man
played off the pads towards short square leg where Younis fields
tossed up on off stump, Kapugedera leans forward and drives towards extra cover where Malik runs to his right and fields
Kapugedera tries to cut one that's a bit quicker and bounces a little more, he gets beaten and Sarfraz also doesn't collect cleanly
fuller ball which Kapugedera drives towards long-off for a single
fullish delivery on middle and leg, Kapugedera tries to step out and flicks off his pads towards short fine leg
good length delivery on off stump, Kapugedera strides forward and defends with  straight bat towards extra cover

what a strike! Kapugedera takes two steps forward, picks up Iftikhar's length early and lofts him over wide long-on with tremendous power, he used a lot of bottom hand for that shot and hit the ball from outside off
defended on the front foot towards the off side
fuller length angling into the right-hander, Kapugedera pushes back to the bowler on the front foot
Iftikhar ends the over with a bouncer which Kapugedera ducks under, just the six off the over
played off the back foot off his pads towards square leg
Sangakkara stays in his crease and nudges the ball in front of square for one
bowled quick through the air on off stump, defended off the back foot to the bowler
a bit too short and Kapugedera has enough time to move back and force the ball through midwicket
better length on off and middle, Kapugedera strides forward and blocks
this time the length isn't that short but Kapugedera still tries to hit towards midwicket, he doesn't beat the in-field but the batsmen run a quick single
Kapugedera strides forward and pushes a slow delivery from outside off towards short third man
Kapugedera tries to play the slog sweep but gets a top edge which falls safely to Misbah's left at deep midwicket
huge roar for lbw as Sangakkara misses the sweep and gets hit on the pad, that might have pitched outside leg as Malik is bowling from over the wicket to the left-hander
Sangakkara gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
Kapugedera nudges the ball towards midwicket for the single which brings up Sri Lanka's 100
tossed up on middle stump, defended on the front foot towards the leg side
driven towards long on for a single
tossed up on leg stump, Sangakkara moves his front foot across and sweeps towards deep backward square
he's slipped down leg side this time and neither the batsman nor the wicket keeper can make proper contact, the ball runs for four leg byes
worked off the pads towards square leg
Sangakkara works the ball off his pads into the great wide open spaces at square leg
bowled flat through the air on off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
Sangakkara strides forward and pushes towards mid-off
Sangakkara drives the ball towards long-off and walks the single
wicket to wicket line from Malik, Kapugedera plays the ball towards midwicket for another single
Sangakkara gets down on one knee and swats the ball through midwicket, another single

massive! Kapugedera takes a step and a half forward, gets to the pitch of the ball outside off stump and sends it soaring over wide long on with a powerful heave, these two have now added 50 for the third wicket
bowled quicker through the air on off stump, Sangakkara moves forward and drives past the bowler for one
tossed up on off stump, Kapugedera gets behind the line on the front foot and defends
cut off the back foot to point
Afridi fires it down leg side, wide called, well collected by Sarfraz
Kapugedera drives a full ball towards long on for a single

Sangakkara waits in his crease for Afridi to drift the ball across him and glides the ball towards third man where Butt slides along the boundary and pulls it in, did he touch the boundary as he pulled it in? No he didn't
defended on the front foot from outside off towards cover
Kapugedera gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball in the air down to fine leg
Sangakkara moves on to the back foot and punches the ball through cover
bowled flat and straight on middle stump, Kapugedera moves back and flicks the ball off his pads through midwicket
pushed to cover off the front foot
Sangakkara takes a step out of his crease and drives to long off
Kapugedera moves forward and pushes towards long on for one more
Kapugedera moves forward to get to the pitch of the ball and drives firmly through cover, he's split the gap in the outfield as well
pushed off the front foot towards cover point
Sangakkara leans forward and opens the face to play the ball behind point
played towards short third man off the back foot
defended towards the bowler off the back foot
Kapugedera once again moves back and pushes down the ground for one
flighted delivery on middle and off, Kapugedera drives off the front foot towards cover point
Sangakkara moves forward to a flatter and straighter ball and pushes to long on
Kapugedera defends on the front foot towards cover
not much flight so far, outside off stump this time, Kapugedera drives off the front foot to deep cover
that's a wayward ball, short on leg stump, Sangakkara rocks back and pulls but straight to the fielder at long leg
played off the back foot towards short third man, Amjad's given only four off his first over in ODIs, steady start
on leg stump once again and this time Sangakkara makes superb contact with the sweep and places it fine of the fielder at long leg, he reaches his 50 with that shot, well played!
driven off the front foot towards long on
Kapugedera drives off the front foot towards cover for one
Sangakkara gets on to the front foot and drives past the bowler for another single
Kapugedera punches through the off side for one more
Sangakkara works the ball through square leg for yet another single, a four and five singles off that over
tight line and length on middle stump, Kapugedera leans forward and defends on the leg side, Amjad runs towards midwicket and fields
driven off the front foot towards long off
Kapugedera gets forward and plays the ball to point

Amjad's picked up his maiden wicket!! He pitched the ball outside off stump and Kapugedera tried to play the slog sweep against the turn, he got a top edge that flew high in the air towards deep midwicket where Younis Khan settled under the catch, Amjad is understandably and visibly delighted
a touch too short and Sangakkara moves back in his crease and pulls to deep square leg where Wahab sprints to his left and picks the ball up cleanly
Silva pushes the ball through cover and runs the single and then they decide to come back for a quick second, well run
turn for Malik, fair bit of turn, Sangakkara pushed at it without any footwork and was beaten
Sangakkara defends off the back foot to the bowler
played through point off the back foot for one
tossed up on off stump, Silva moves forward and defends back towards the bowler
Silva waits in his crease and nudges a delivery from middle and leg towards fine leg
that's a poor ball, tossed up wide outside leg stump, Sangakkara has plenty of time to get into position and sweep the ball past the fielder at short fine leg for four
that's very lucky for Silva and very unlucky for Amjad, Silva tried to sweep from outside off stump and the top edge flew over the wicketkeeper for four
he's played this one superbly, Silva moved forward to a quick ball outside off and opened the face to guide it past short third man for four more
nudged off the front foot towards cover for a single
bowled flat and on leg stump, Sangakkara moves across and nudges off his pads to short fine leg
flat delivery once again on middle and leg, Sangakkara nudges towards square leg
he's not flighting it this over, flat and quick outside off, Silva pushes towards cover point and keeps strike
on leg stump once again and Silva sweeps the ball firmly to the fine leg boundary
nudged off his pads towards midwicket for one
Sangakkara moves deep in his crease and punches the ball towards long off
Silva defends the ball on the off side and calls for the single

that's a ridiculous delivery, a high full toss on leg stump, Malik hit the stumps at the bowler's end as he was delivering that, Sangakkara waits for it patiently and pulls the ball over short fine leg for four
defended solidly back towards the bowler
bowled flat through the air on middle and off, played off the back foot to point
defended on the front foot on the off side
he's really sending them down quick now, Silva cuts off the back foot through point
Sangakkara leans forward and works the ball off his pads wide of the fielder at short fine leg for one
that was slower and it bounced and turned a bit more outside off stump, Silva tries to cut but gets beaten
defended back to the bowler on the front foot, "Yourself!" shouts Sarfraz from behind the stumps
that's hammered, the length was short outside off stump, Sangakkara waited on the back foot and punched the ball hard through cover for four
played off the back foot through point for one
short of a length on leg and middle, Silva moves across and tries to work the ball from his hips but misses
too full outside off stump, Silva strides forward and drives the ball firmly along the ground to deep cover
Wahab goes round the wicket and angles the ball into the right-hander, Silva stays in his crease and nudges the ball to square leg
Sangakkara waits on the back foot and cuts towards point
that's the googly, it pitched outside off and Silva thrust his pad out and blocked it
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Silva tries to sweep the ball from outside off and gets hit on the pad, Amjad appeals but the impact was outside the line of off stump
defended on the front foot towards the off side
bit of width outside off stump and Silva cuts the ball to short third man
"Yourself, very well bowled!" yells Sarfraz as Amjad finishes his over with a tight wicket to wicket delivery which Silva defends back to the bowler
good length delivery on off stump, Sangakkara stands tall and punches back to the bowler
too short and too wide outside off stump, Sangakkara waits for the ball on the back foot and lifts it over the infield at cover for four more
Wahab replies with a sharp bouncer which forces Sangakkara to duck
Sangakkara moves back and opens the face to play the ball towards point, Sangakkara sets off for the single but gets sent back, Misbah misses at the batsman's end and concedes an overthrow
Silva moves on to the front foot and flicks off his pads towards deep square leg
too full on middle and leg stump, Sangakkara lifts the ball off his pads into the gap at wide long on, Younis runs quickly to his right from deep midwicket and prevents the boundary
Silva moves across his stumps to sweep to short fine leg, Sangakkara calls for the quick single which brings up the 50 partnership off only 45 balls
Sangakkara steps out and drives the ball firmly towards the bowler, the ball hits Amjad and ricochets towards mid-on for one
Silva pushes towards the off side for one
short ball and Sangakkara moves back and pulls towards midwicket
Silva lunges forward and sweeps powerfully to deep square leg
Sangakkara drives towards long off for the sixth single of the over
bowled flat and a tad short, Sangakkara moves back and pulls towards midwicket
Silva moves back and tries to work the ball on the leg side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
bowled flat on middle and leg, Silva moves forward and works the ball behind square
Sangakkara backs away and runs the ball off the face of the bat to Yousuf at short third man
bowled quick outside off stump, Silva mis-times the cut to point
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
defended on the leg side
Sangakkara moves forward and plays the ball to long on for a single
bowled quick and straight, Silva comes on to the front foot and nudges towards point for one
Sangakkara gets on to the front foot and closes the face to play the ball behind square
well Silva's got down on one knee and slog swept the ball from outside off into the gap at deep square leg
dropped short on the leg side for a quick single
dragged short outside off stump, Silva cuts off the back foot in front of point
Sangakkara waits for a flat delivery to come into him and pushes towards midwicket
Silva moves back and works a ball from outside off to midwicket
the line is a bit too straight which allows Sangakkara to flick off his pads towards short fine leg
quick and straight from Afridi, this time Silva has to defend towards the bowler
swept towards Wahab Riaz at deep backward square who fumbles and allows the second run
worked off the pads towards the leg side
tossed up outside off stump, Silva gets on to the front foot and drives to deep cover
a bit short and Sangakkara moves back to pull the ball through midwicket for another single
Silva pushes forward at the googly and gets an inside edge on to the pad
fired down leg side, Silva sweeps but doesn't make proper contact, he gets a single to short fine leg
Sangakkara's carted that! He came down the track, got to the pitch of the ball, squared himself up slightly and lofted the ball over deep midwicket and sent it several rows back
Silva's waited for this and played the late cut past the fielder at short third man for four, he used the bowler's pace superbly
short and wide outside off, Silva cuts the ball through cover for a single
Sangakkara moves on to 98 by pushing off the front foot towards point
Silva plants his front foot forward and sweeps to deep backward square leg
Sangakkara gets down on one knee and sweeps the ball in the air past short fine leg for a single to long leg
cut off the back foot through point for one
a good length delivery angles into the right-hander, Silva comes forward and nudges past the bowler on the leg side for a single
he gets 100 No 9 by walking across and flicking a full ball towards square leg, he raises his bat aloft at the end of that run, it's been a fluent performance from him

caught! Tanvir delivers from extremely wide of the crease and angles the ball into the right-hander, Silva stays in his crease and opens the face, trying to play the ball to third man, the ball bounces a bit more and takes the edge through to Sarfraz
pushed off the front foot through cover for one
Sangakkara moves forward and punches towards mid-on, midwicket runs across and cuts it off
pushed towards midwicket, Tanvir ends an excellent over
Thushara clears his front foot out of the way and tries to hammer the ball over midwicket, he gets beaten by a slower one from Afridi and Sangakkara runs the single
driven back to the bowler off the front foot
played towards cover off the front foot, another dot ball
Sangakkara leans forward and drives to long-on
Thushara once again tries to slog over midwicket but mis-times it
driven down the ground once more for a single
punched down the ground for  a single, Pakistan have kept it tight in the last two, three overs
full ball angling into the left-hander, Thushara lofts the ball towards long on and Sangakkara sprints back to the danger end for the second
the slower ball outside off stump, Thushara tries to hit across the line but gets comprehensively beaten, hmmm I think holding Dilshan back may not have been the best move
pulled with power towards deep midwicket where Butt keeps the ball inside the boudnary with some nifty handwork
another slower ball outside off stump, Thushara throws his bat wildly and gets beaten once again
this one is fuller straighter and quicker, Thushara gets an inside edge past his stumps to short fine leg
shot! Sangakkara has changed his bat and used the new one to whack the ball over midwicket, he hit that with a golf swing for four
Sangakkara moves forward and drives the ball through cover for a single this time
Thushara goes back and tries to slog once again but mis-times the ball towards midwicket in the circle, Yousuf runs forward but can't reach the ball in time to take the catch
Sangakkara hits the ball in the air through cover and sprints through for two, he's showing a lot of energy, keeping wicket for 50 overs after this will test him
driven past the bowler for a single
Thushara hits the ball towards long off with a flat bat to keep the strike
that's an odd slog, he stood in his crease and threw his bat at it, it didn't look like he connected properly but the ball nearly carried for six towards wide long off
now Thushara tries to whack the ball towards deep square leg, the camera thinks he's connected but the ball hasn't left the pitch
slower ball outside off stump, Thushara mis-time the hit to long off where Malik fields
Sangakkara moves across his stumps and uses the angle into him from over the wicket to swing the ball towards deep square leg
another attempted slog falls safely, Thushara tried to pull the ball but the top edge lobbed tamely into the vacant space at short square leg
short ball and Sangakkara swivels but can't pull the ball past Butt at midwicket

bowled him! Tanvir gets his fourth! Sangakkara moves outside the line of off stump and tries to chip a full ball over the fielder at short fine leg, he misses and the ball hits off and middle stump, off he goes to get some rest before he comes out to keep again, excellent innings

is that six? Thushara pulls a short ball off the front foot towards deep midwicket where Misbah realises the ball is going over the boundary and taps it in with his left hand, the ball grazes the inside of the boudnary rope as it falls inside the boundary, it's been signaled four
driven firmly down the ground for two runs

ok Thushara's making me eat my words now, he's stood on the back foot and lofted a short of a length ball with tremendous power over the head of the fielder at long-on for six, this is why he was sent in ahead of Dilshan
he tries to slog a good length ball across the line towards deep midwicket but only manages an inside edge behind square on the leg side
Dilshan tries to smash a good length ball from outside off stump into orbit at midwicket, he doesn't make contact and gets beaten
fuller and straighter from Iftikhar, Dilshan had moved his front foot out of the way but in the end he was cramped for room and had to drive towards long on for one
Tanvir cramps Dilshan for room with one that angles into the right-hander from round the wicket, he mis-times the shot on the off side for a single
slower full toss from over the wicket, Thushara pulls towards deep square leg for a single
full delivery from round the wicket to the right-hander, Dilshan flicks to deep midwicket for a single

caught! And well caught! Tanvir picks up his maiden five-for in ODIs, he pitched the ball short and Thushara pulled it flat off the front foot, the ball was traveling flat and quickly towards deep midwicket where Wahab ran to his left and took a sharp catch
powerful drive and the fielder has no chance, Dilshan strides forward and drills a length ball through cover, he places it to the right of the fielder and gets four
flicked off his pads through the leg side for a single
full and wide outside off stump, the keeper can't collect leanly and they run a single in addition to the wide
full ball nearly in the blockhole, Vaas jams his bat down at it and squeezes it in front of point
Vaas pushes the ball towards mid on for a single
bowled him! The ball wasn't that short and Dilshan tried to pull it over midwicket, he got a bottom edge that went on to hit his stumps
full and quick outside off stump, Kulasekera misses the ball and Sarfraz prevents the bye by releasing it quickly
this time the line is down leg side and Vaas also sprints through for a single, that's a wide and Sri Lanka bring up 300
banged in short and Vaas hits it with a flat bat towards long-on, the ball reaches the fielder on the bounce
full delivery outside off stump, Kulasekera plays the ball through point and they run only a single

inn2.comm: bowled him! What a start! Vaas hits the perfect length first up and pitches it just outside off, the ball nips back into the left-hander and Butt drives forward at it, he gets a thin inside edge on to his stumps, he hardly moved his feet and turned around in time to see the ball clip off stump I wonder if Younis will be ready to walk out!
Vaas pitches the ball on a good length, angling the ball across the right-hander and bending back in off the pitch, Younis defends on the front foot
Younis moves forward to another good length ball and pushes towards mid-off with a straight bat
shorter length outside the off stump, Younis cuts off the back foot towards point
good length delivery slants across the right-hander this time, Younis strides forward and drives towards point
excellent line and length on off stump, Younis defends on the front foot, Vaas starts with a wicket maiden
good length delivery to start with, pitches around off stump and angles into the right-hander, Malik defends back to the bowler
a bit too straight, slanting into middle and leg, Malik works the ball down to fine leg for single
Younis waits for a good length delivery to slant into him and opens the face to guide the ball to third man, he played that from rather close to off stump
Malik stays in his crease for a good length delivery outside off and defends towards cover
straighter line, angling into off and middle, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
that one kept quite low outside off stump, Malik hardly moved his feet as he defended from his crease
good length once again from Vaas on off stump, relentless he is, defended off the front foot on the off side
the line is on leg and middle this time allowing Younis to nudge the ball off his pads towards square leg

Malik gets squared up by one that pitches around off stump and slants across him, this one kept a little low as well, Malik plays it with soft hands and the edge falls well short of Jayawardene at first slip
Malik moves across and pushes off his pads towards midwicket
defended on the front foot towards mid-off
fuller length on off and middle, Malik leans forward and pushes back towards Vaas
the length is a bit short and the line is wide, which allows Younis the freedom to reach out for it and drive the ball on the up through cover for four
and again! Younis moves forward and drives the ball on the up to the left of the fielder at mid-off for four more
fuller length and the line is on middle stump, Younis pushes to mid-on off the front foot and calls for the single
defended on the front foot to the off side
good length and line around off stump, defended back to the bowler
too full on leg stump, Malik clips it off his pads through square leg for two more to end the over
Younis moves forward and across early to create the angle to work the ball off his pads through square leg
shot! Too full outside the off stump, Younis moves forward and drives the ball firmly along the ground through covers for four
better line from Vaas, on off and middle, Younis nudges towards mid-on for a single
too full outside the off stump, it was the slower one as well, Malik picked it and drove it hard through cover point for four more
lovely shot! Malik strides forward and punches the ball on the up past the fielder at mid-off for another four
this time his attempt to drive on the up results in an outside edge that rolls towards point, 15 runs off that over
good tight line, on a length, pushed towards point
driven off the back foot to backward point
full toss outside off, seemed to missed out but Tillakaratne Dilshan got a bad bounce at backward point and that raced away for four
good length ball, tries to cut, gets bottom edge
yorker, outside off and he's beaten for pace there
on a length on off, driven forcefully back to the bowler
on a length, on middle and off, turned away towards fine leg
back of a length, on leg stump, pushed towards mid-on
on a length, pitched on off and angling away, Malik gets on the front foot and defends
just outside off, slightly short, defended on the back foot this time
on middle this time, Malik turns it towards midwicket, thinks of a single but decides against it
keeps it tight again, Malik defends on the front foot
short and a bit of width, Younis tries a powerful cut but fails to make contact
in the corridor, back of a length, driven to mid-off, sharp single taken
short of length, just outside off, driven towards cover, doesn't beat the field
outside off, short, cut behind square for a single
short, slower ball on middle, pulls but gets an edge and it trickles to midwicket
outside off, Malik flashes at that but it goes through to the keeper. Big appeal but the umpire isn't interested, and rightly so
short, angling away, carved towards covers
on his pads this time, Younis dabs that to mid-on
beaten! back of a length on middle and off and goes on with the angle, Malik defensive push doesn't make contact
wider this time, Malik slashes at that, but is beaten again
no room for Malik, he jabs it to third man
on middle and leg, Younis punches it to mid-on, batsmen think of a single but that was hit too hard for that
just outside off, back of a length, Malik cuts it and it takes the bottom edge and runs away to third man
driven powerfully to mid-off but no run
good length, pushed back to the bowler
the yorker fired in on middle stump, Younis digs it out on the off side
full length once again, driven off the front foot to mid off
a low full toss to end the over, pushed towards mid-on off the front foot
Malik comes on to the front foot and nudges the ball towards mid-on
good length delivery pitches around off stump and slants across the right-hander, Malik swishes and misses, the ball dies as it reaches Sangakkara
Malik waits on the back foot and cuts the slower ball towards third man, Pakistan have scored only nine runs off the last five overs, 30 balls since the last boundary
good length delivery on off stump, defended off the front foot
superb line and length on middle stump, Younis gets behind the line and defends on the front foot
Younis improvises by paddling the ball from off stump through the vacant fine leg region for four, risky shot but Pakistan need some momentum
he starts off with a full ball on off stump which Malik dispatches to the straight boundary with a punch that forces Younis to duck at the non-striker's end
better length on off and middle, Malik defends on the front foot
short of a length outside off stump, Malik waits for it and cuts late towards the fielder at third man
good length ball on middle stump, it keeps a little low and forces Younis to defend from his crease back to the bowler
good length once again from Thushara, played back to the bowler on the front foot
that's a poor line on leg stump, Younis whips the ball off his pads down to the fine leg boundary, productive over for Pakistan
played down to third man for one more
tight line and length on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards mid off
good length delivery angling across the right hander, played off the back foot towards point
Younis moves forward and drives the ball uppishly to the fielder at short cover

huge appeal for leg before, Younis once again got across his stumps and tried to paddle it towards fine leg, this time the length wasn't full enough and he got hit on the pad, that was going to miss off
good length outside off to end the over, Younis defends towards cover, just one run off the over
tight line and length around off stump, defended on the front foot
Malik opens the face on the back foot and runs the ball towards third man

Younis takes two steps down the track, Thushara sees him coming and shortens his length, Younis defends on the leg side and runs the single, Thushara runs to field and hits the stumps at the non-striker's end but Younis is home
the short of a length ball gets big on Malik who gets on top of the bounce and guides the ball to third man
Younis moves forward and chips the ball over midwicket for two, Kulasekera throws from the deep and Malik had to hurry to make his ground
pushed off the front foot towards Jayasuriya at mid-off for a quick single
Younis once again gets down on one knee and plays the paddle sweep from off stump towards fine leg, he's done that thrice now against Vaas
width offered outside off stump and Younis reaches out and drives on the up through cover point for four, superbly timed and placed
this time he tries to cut the ball a little too hard and mis-times the shot towards point
the slower ball from Vaas, Younis defends back to the bowler
Younis picks up the slower ball and gets down on one knee to sweep behind square for two more
driven off the front foot towards cover
Malik mis-times the push down the ground and plays it to mid-on, he sets off for the single but once again has to hurry, he might have been out if the throw had hit direct
fuller length on middle stump, Younis stays on his crease and drives to the bowler
Younis tries to cut but gets a thick bottom edge on the off side
Younis cuts once again and this time Jayawardene fumbles at point and allows the single, I think it may have been a bit of bad bounce
Malik stays in his crease and cuts one that's too close to him, Jayawardene had just moved to slip and the ball went to him on the bounce
Malik cuts a delivery from close to his body hard into the ground to Dilshan who has replaced Jayawardene at point
he starts off with a short ball which takes Younis by surprise, he tries to hook but is in no position whatsoever, the ball passes the bat and there's a huge appeal for caught behind
good length this time on off stump, Younis defends on the off side
Younis strides forward and punches a full ball firmly towards mid-off where Jayasuriya moves quickly to his right and cuts off the run
Kulasekara fires the ball into the block hole and Younis plays it out back to the bowler, Kulasekara fields and shies at the stumps

huge wicket! Younis tries to pull another short ball but it was slightly slower, the ball hit high on the bat and lobbed up towards midwicket where Murali pedaled backwards and took the catch, he raised his arms in delight at completing it
good length once again on off stump, Malik defends back to the bowler
short of a length delivery angles across Yousuf from over the wicket, he stands tall on the back foot and drives towards point
good length delivery keeps a little low outside off stump, Yousuf connects with the bottom of the bat and nearly plays on
fuller length on middle stump, Yousuf sprints the single after pushing towards Vaas at mid-on
Malik moves forward and punches a full ball towards cover where the fielder makes a half stop which allows the batsmen to run the single
Yousuf works the ball off his hips towards midwicket
Yousuf reaches out for a wide delivery and drives the ball on the up through cover, it was hit in the air but he placed it so well that no one had a chance to either catch it or cut off the boundary
he gets the ball to turn into Malik from outside off stump, he defends on the leg side
Malik moves back and plays the off break with the turn towards square leg for a single
Murali strays down leg side this time and Yousuf sweeps the ball fine past Jayasuriya who gives frantic chase but can't stop it
Yousuf leans forward and defends on the leg side
tossed up on off stump, defended on the front foot
Murali gives the ball a lot of air on off stump, Yousuf leans forward to work the ball on the leg side but doesn't quite manage it
short and wide outside off stump, Malik mis-times the cut towards cover, he missed out there
fuller length outside off, Malik moves forward and defends towards point
Malik waits in his crease for a short of a length delivery to slant across him and cuts it late towards third man
fuller and straighter from Thushara on off stump, Yousuf strides forward and defends with a straight bat to the off side
Yousuf drives firmly off the front foot but gets nothing for it because he's placed it straight to the fielder
Yousuf tries to drive a good length delivery through the off but he mis-times it, the pitch looks like it's slowing up, only one off that over
Malik moves deep in his crease and waits for the ball to spin into him from outside off before working it behind square for one
Yousuf moves back and works the doosra behind square for one more
Malik moves on to the back foot once again and cuts the straighter one behind point for one
big turn for Murali from outside off stump towards middle, Yousuf moves back and cuts towards point
more air from Murali this time which allows Malik to drive him off the front foot towards mid off

dropped, or did it carry? Yousuf tries to sweep but the top edge lobs towards backward square, Jayasuriya runs to his left from short fine leg but can't quite reach it, the ball falls just wide of him
short of a length delivery angles across Yousuf and gets big on him, he jumps on to the back foot and runs it towards third man
Malik plays the ball to midwicket by closing the face of the bat
played behind point off the back foot for a single
super shot, the length is too full and Malik presents the full face of the bat and drives the ball straight past the bowler, Thushara has fielders in the deep though
Malik mis-times the pull against a short ball but the mis-hit falls safely in the deep
Yousuf moves forward and drives the ball through point, he opened the face to place it there, Pakistan got seven runs off the over
Yousuf cuts the doosra off the back foot towards point
bowled quicker through the air on off stump, Malik doesn't have time to work the ball on the leg side and defends to the bowler
flatter and fuller once again, Malik defends on the front foot
Murali pushes Malik into a back-foot defence with a quicker ball on off and middle
another dot ball, its quick on off and middle once again, Malik defends on the leg side
this time Malik is able to work the ball off his pads for a single behind square
the first one is an off break, Yousuf defends on the front foot towards the off side
the second is also an offbreak which turns into Yousuf, he moves back and cuts through point to bring up the 100
worked off the pads behind square for a single
that is the straighter one which Malik works on the leg side
Yousuf tries to nudge the ball off his pads but can't get it away
the length is a bit short and Yousuf moves back and drives the ball firmly to cover
Malik waits on the back foot, reads the doosra and cuts the ball behind point for a single
that's the off break and Yousuf tries to cut but the length is too full and he gets beaten
sublime, Murali drifts the ball into the right-hander and rips the doosra past the outside edge of Yousuf's forward defence
a bit too full and Yousuf flicks the ball to midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards long on for a single
Malik strides outside the line of off stump and works the ball on the leg side
bowled quick and straight, Malik defends on the front foot
he drifts on to the pads this time and Malik nudges the ball behind square
Yousuf tries to drive straight but gets a thick inside edge through midwicket for  a single
straight delivery from Mendis and Malik drives him straight down the ground to long on for one
tight line and length on off stump, Yousuf leans forward and defends back to the bowler

lbw! Yousuf tries to sweep and gets his front foot a long way across his stumps, Mendis beats him with a fullish delivery which went straight on to hit Yousuf low on the front pad in front of middle, that's pretty plumb, it was too full for the sweep
driven off the front foot towards long on for one
Misbah strides forward and works the ball towards square leg
Malik drives the ball once again to long on for a single
bowled quick outside the off stump, Misbah moves back and defends
Misbah moves forward and flicks the ball off his pads behind square for two
Misbah moves outside the line of off stump and nudges towards midwicket, the runs are coming at a trickle now, the asking-rate has climbed over eight an over
Mendis delivers a full toss which Malik drives towards long on for a single
bowled full and straight, Misbah moves forward and plays the ball to midwicket
Misbah gets a long stride forward and nudges towards midwicket
Misbah moves on to the back foot and defends on the off side
Malik flicks the ball off the back foot towards square leg for a single
this one straightens off the pitch after angling into the right-hander, Misbah defends on the front foot
driven off the front foot through cover point for  a single
Misbah moves on to the back foot and cuts a delivery close to off stump through point
Malik moves back and across and flicks the ball off his pads towards square leg
that's the straighter one outside off stump and Misbah lets it go
Misbah tries to nudge the ball on the leg side but the doosra begins to spin across him and he ends up defending
Misbah plays the ball behind square but the wicketkeeper cuts off the single
the offbreak turns into the right-hander, Malik pushes it to cover
defended on the front foot towards midwicket
Malik closes the face and plays the ball through midwicket for one
Misbah leans forward and nudges the ball off his pads behind square for one
Malik brings up his 50 by nudging the ball through square leg off his pads, he's needed 76 balls to get there, Pakistan need him to close that gap
Misbah gets squared up by one that straightens off the pitch after threatening to spin into him, he mad moved across to play the ball on the leg side but ends up defending to the bowler
Malik jumps on to the back foot and cuts the ball to deep point for a single
Misbah strides forward and runs the single as soon as he pushes the ball towards long on

dropped! Well Silva never got to it, Malik tried to loft the ball down the ground but got a top edge that flew high over the infield at cover, the ball was going to fall halfway to the boundary and Silva couldn't get back quickly enough, the ball fell out of reach of his desperate dive
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
driven off the front foot towards long on
bowled quickly through the air on middle stump, defended on the back foot
about time from Paisitan's point of view! Misbah gets down on one knee and clobbers the off break over the deep midwicket boundary with a  powerful slog sweep, the stadium erupts in noise
defended on the front foot to the leg side
played towards midwicket off the front foot
played towards third man for a single

he's done him in with a legcutter! Malik came out of his crease to play the ball on the leg side, Mendis beat him with a shorter length and slid the legcutter just enough to beat the outside of the bat, Sangakkara did the rest, Malik's gone for 52 off 79 balls which is just not good enough I'm afraid
he bowls it wide outside off stump, Misbah tries to reverse sweep but misses
once again he tosses it up outside off stump, Misbah lets it go
again it's wide outside off stump and Misbah once again attempts the reverse sweep, it's been called wide as well and Sangakkara couldn't collect

what's Afridi done here? He's facing his first ball and he tries to smash it against the spin on the leg side, Jayasuriya tosses it up wide outside the off stump, Afridi makes contact outside off and skies the ball high in the air towards long off where the substitute Mubarak takes the catch
pulled off the back foot from outside off stump through midwicket
pushed towards midwicket for a single
played with an open face towards third man for one
Misbah leans forward and closes the face to play the ball towards midwicket
Mendis pitches the off break outside off and nips it back into Amjad who defends  to the fielder at silly point, yes there's a silly point in place
defended on the front foot towards cover
Misbah gets hit on the pad but the ball was missing leg
played off the front foot behind point for one
Amjad moves back in his crease and works the ball towards short fine leg
tossed up on middle stump, pushed towards long on for a single
loud appeal for lbw because Jayasuroya hit Amjad on the front pad with one that was coming in with the arm, close shout, very close
another appeal against Misbah but the ball was missing leg
Misbah plays the reverse sweep and gets one for his effort
Amjad defends on the front foot towards the bowler
Amjad takes a step down and chips the ball down to long on for  a single
Mendis hits Amjad on the pad with a quicker one that cuts into the right-hander, that was missing leg
played off the pads through midwicket
Misbah plants his front foot down the pitch and lofts Mendis superbly over long-on for six, powerful shot
defended on the off side towards point, they run a single

lbw! Mendis pitches the ball on off stump and skids it through to Amjad who gets hit low on the front pad in front of middle stump, that is a quicker ball and Mendis appeals confidently, Tony Hill raises the finger
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, Sarfraz leans forward and blocks
tossed up slowly by Jayasuriya, drifting into middle stump, pushed off the front foot on the off side
driven off the front foot towards long on for a single
driven towards cover off the front foot
Jayasuriya pitches the ball on off stump and spins the ball across the outside edge of his defence
pushed off the front foot towards Dilshan at point
Misbah gets into position to play the reverse sweep and hits it through point
Misbah waits in his crease and runs the ball off the face of his bat towards third man
fuller length outside off stump, Sarfraz reaches out and defends off the front foot towards cover
short of a length on leg stump, Sarfraz pushes towards midwicket for a single
Misbah moves across his stumps and flicks the ball off his pads towards fine leg where Jayasuriya picks it up on the boundary line, what effort from someone who turns 39 tomorrow
defended on the back foot towards point
Misbah leans forward and drives a full ball towards long on for a single to keep the strike
bowls flat through the air on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Misbah gets down on one knee and mows the ball over deep midwicket with a mighty heave, he's waging a lone battle but the cause is almost lost
quicker ball from Jayasuroya, Misbah  plays the ball on the off side
Sarfraz closes the face of the bat on the front foot and nudges towards square leg
Misbah drives off the front foot towards cover
bowled slower through the air on off stump, pushed off the front foot towards cover point
tight line and length on off stump, defended to point off the back foot, Dilshan is so quick to get to the ball
worked off the pads behind square for a single
good length delivery angling across the right-hander, Sarfraz pushes towards the off side for a single

Misbah moves forward and plays the ball through midwicket, Misbah wants to come back for the second and Sarfraz is sprinting to make his ground, the throw comes into Vaas and by the time he whips off the bails Sarfraz is just safe, a direct hit and he would have been out
Misbah moves deep in his crease and nudges the ball towards midwicket for another single
Sarfraz gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends on the off side
bowled flat through the air on off, defended on the front foot
Misbah moves back and pushes the ball towards midwicket for one
the doosra pitches around off stump and bounces sharply past Sarfraz's bat
full ball on leg stump, Sarfraz sweeps to deep backward square
Misbah moves forward to a straighter one and closes the face to play the ball towards midwicket
the batsman tries to cut a quicker ball outside off but misses
bowled quick and straight, Misbah moves back and across and pulls towards long on, that's his 50, whoops it isn't he's on 49
played behind point off the back foot for a single
Misbah plays the ball with soft hands towards point and now reaches his 50, he raises his bat but Pakistan don't have much to celebrate at the moment
loud appeal for lbw as Sarfraz thrusts his pad forward and gets hit
Sarfraz tries to weep but doesn't make proper contact
this time he does make contact and places the sweep towards deep backward square
Murali finds the leading edge of Sarfraz's bat with the doosra and the ball lobs up towards short fine leg, they run a quick single and there's an overthrow at the bowler's end
struck on the pads outside off for a leg bye
punched off the back foot towards cover
pulled off the back foot to deep square leg
another doosra but this time Sarfraz moves back and nudges the ball towards point

shot! Misbah waits in his crease for a full ball on middle stump and simply lofts it over the in field into the gap between deep midwicket and long on, that's his first four and his first boundary against Murali
full ball on off stump, Sarfraz defends towards cover off the front foot
Sarfraz gets down low and sweeps the low full toss towards deep midwicket
another full toss and Misbah stands in his crease and pulls powerfully into that favoured gap at wide long on
Thushara replies with a short ball and Misbah tries to play a half-hook/half-swat, he ends up mis-hitting it to the bowler
super! Misbah stands and delivers by lofting Thushara through the line over long on, he's clearing the boundary comfortably, Misbah's got 1000 runs in ODIs now
full ball outside off stump, Misbah reaches out and plays the ball through cover point, he calls Sarfraz through for a quick two
Sarfraz nudges the ball behind point off the back foot

bowled short and flat, Misbah rocks back and pulls towards wide long on, Sarfraz sprints back for the second and dives like Superman to make his ground, Mendis didn't break the stumps for some reason, he was looking to see where Sarfraz was
Misbah tries to cut off the back foot and gets a thick outside edge but the deviation was so large that Sangakkara couldn't hold on
now Misbah goes again and heaves the ball into the gap at wide long on for a one bounce four
pulled once again towards midwicket, Mendis bowled a quicker and shorter ball
pushed towards the off side on the front foot
good length ball on off stump, defended behind point with an open face and they run a single
Misbah backs away towards leg to make room but Kulasekara follows him, he flicks a low full toss to long leg
Kulasekara digs in a short ball and Sarfraz mis-times the hook towards backward square leg
excellent ball in the yorker, Misbah digs it out towards long on for  a single
Kulasekara bowls an excellent short ball that slants into Sarfraz who barely manages to move his head out of the way
Sarfraz gets down on one knee and mis-times the pull towards midwicket
Sarfraz backs away and cuts the ball from the stumps through backward point
Misbah brings out the reverse sweep and plays it towards cover
Misbah's resistance ends, he goes for a huge heave and misses a straight one from Mendis and gets bowled, Mendis has his fourth wicket
Tanvir strides forward and defends towards the off side
Tanvir moves his front foot outside the line and defends towards the off side, they run a quick single
driven off the back foot towards sweeper cover
pushed off the front foot towards midwicket for a single
bowled him! Kulasekara pitches the slower ball on a good length on off stump and slants it into the right-hander, Sarfraz tries to cut but gets beaten by the change of pace
Kulasekara beats Iftikhar with a good length ball that seams past the off stump
pushed towards midwicket where a misfields allows the single
lofted towards long on for another single
Iftikhar flicks a full ball off his pads through midwicket for four
Tanvir gets his front foot across and sweeps the ball in the air to the deep square leg boundary
Tanvir stills sweeps the ball from way outside off stump towards deep midwicket
pushed off the back foot towards cover point, there's a large gap there so they run two
caught! Murali picks up his first wicket, Iftikhar tries to play the slog sweep but gets a top edge which lands safely in Kulasekara's hands at short fine leg
Wahab thrusts his pad outside the line of off stump and defends
Wahab once again stretches a long way forward and defends with bat close to the front pad, did I hear cheers from the crowd?
bowled full in the block hole outside off stump, Tanvir tries to dig it out but gets beaten
full delivery and Tanvir lashes it through the covers for one
Wahab tries to plat towards long on but gets a leading edge towards cover
excellent bouncer, Wahab gets out of the way in a hurry
the bouncer is followed by the yorker which Wahab just about manages to keep out
that's it, Sri Lanka have won by 64 runs, the last ball was an excellent yorker which Tanvir could only defend
